mapper.select: select c.normal_number, nu.users_name, c.care_number, c.comments_content, c.comments_created_date, c.comments_updated_date from tbl_comments c left join tbl_normal_users nu on c.normal_number = nu.users_number where c.care_number = #{careNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comments values (seq_comments.nextVal, #{normalNumber}, #{careNumber}, #{commentsContent}, sysdate, sysdate)
